title: Curvy Girls Do It Better
description: A curvy girl who succumbs to passion for the very first time.A very determined billionaire.Is this a recipe for disaster?Do women with plenty of curves do it better?According to ruggedly handsome Max Keller... they do... big time!After an illicit hook up with the gorgeous billionaire, Candy finds herself caught between a rock and a hard place.She's wrestling.On one hand, she has to maintain professional decorum.On the other, Max is insatiable... and makes her feel so beautiful.Lust is an intoxicating feeling.Itâ€™s nearly impossible for her to resist him.Is she under his spell?This is Part 2 of 4 of this fairytale BBW romance novel with the right touch of naughty!Get it now.
author: Scarlett Avery
